forecast.name: Friday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain between 8pm and 2am, then rain and a slight chance of thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 42. East northeast wind around 8 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers likely between 11pm and 5am, then freezing rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 30. East wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

forecast.detailedForecast: Freezing rain likely before 8am, then a chance of rain showers between 8am and 2pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 44. North wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nubsNob.date: 4/02/25- Closed due to a major ice storm.
nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: The area surrounding Nub's Nob has experienced a massive ice storm that has left much destruction in its wake. Power has recently been restored to the lodge and our Crew is beginning the clean-up effort that includes thousands of down tree branches on our slopes and the road leading to Nub's Nob.  The lodge and locker room are open from 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM if you need to stop out to grab your skis. There is a small chance we could open on very limited terrain on Saturday and Sunday. We will make that decision tomorrow by noon. We hope to see you on the slopes real soon
